00025 int cntrl_browse::handle_event_onclick(object *obj)
00026         {
00027            for(i=0;i<max*4;i++)
00028                 {
00029                  if(b_group[i] == obj)
00030                         {
00031                         call_dialog(i+(page*max*4));
00032                         //page =0;
00033         //              getch();
00034                         init_values();
00035                         break;
00036 
00037                         }
00038 
00039                 }
00040                 if(obj == next)
00041                         {
00042                 page++;
00043             init_values();
00044                         }
00045 
00046   if(obj == prev)
00047                         {
00048                 page--;
00049             init_values();
00050                         }
00051 
00052   if(obj == b_ok)
00053         return UNLOAD_CWIN;
00054                 return OK;
00055                 }

00057 void cntrl_browse::call_dialog(int n)
00058                 {
00059                 control_handler = obj->control_list.getitem(n+1);
00060                 switch(control_handler->type)
00061                         {
00062                         case C_BUTTON:
00063                                         obj->edit_dialog((f_button *)control_handler);
00064                                 break;
00065                                 case C_LABEL:
00066                                         obj->edit_dialog((f_label *)control_handler);
00067                                 break;
00068                                 case C_TEXTBOX:
00069                                         obj->edit_dialog((f_textbox *)control_handler);
00070                                 break;
00071                                 case C_CBOX:
00072                                         obj->edit_dialog((f_cbox *)control_handler);
00073                                 break;
00074                                 case C_OPTION:
00075                                         obj->edit_dialog((f_option *)control_handler);
00076                                 break;
00077                                 
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080 void cntrl_browse::init_values()
00081                 {
00082                 length = obj->control_list.getsize();
00083                 int done = false;
00084                 for(i=0; (i<max);i++)
00085                 for(j=0;j<4;j++)
00086                         {
00087                         b_group[(i*4)+j]->visible = false;
00088                         b_group[(i*4)+j]->setvalue(" ");
00089                         }
00090 
00091 
00092                 for( i=0;((i+(page*max))*4)<length && (i<max)&&!done;i++)
00093                 for( j=0;j<4;j++)
00094                         {
00095                         if(((i+(page*max))*4)+j == length)
00096                                 {
00097                                 done=true;
00098                                 break;
00099                                 }
00100                                 dog("*");
00101                         control_handler = obj->control_list.getitem(((i+(page*max))*4)+j+1);
00102                         b_group[(i*4)+j]->bgcolor=getbgcolor(control_handler);
00103                         b_group[(i*4)+j]->color=getcolor(control_handler);
00104                         
00105                         b_group[(i*4)+j]->visible =true;
00106                         b_group[(i*4)+j]->setvalue(getname(control_handler));
00107 
00108                         }
00109                 if((i+(page*max*4)*4)+j > length)
00110                 next->disabled =true;
00111                 else
00112                 next->disabled =false;
00113                 if(!page)
00114                 prev->disabled = true;
00115                 else
00116                 prev->disabled = false;
00117 
00118 
00119                                 struct viewporttype viewinfo;
00120                 getviewsettings(&viewinfo);
00121 
00122                 setviewport(0,0,getmaxx(),getmaxy(),1);
00123                 paint(1);
00124                 setviewport(viewinfo.left,viewinfo.top,viewinfo.right, viewinfo.bottom,viewinfo.clip);
00125                 }
00126 char* cntrl_browse::getname(control *c)
00127                 {

00129                         {
00130                                 case C_BUTTON:
00131                                         return ((f_button *)control_handler)->name;

00133                                 case C_LABEL:

00140                                         return ((f_cbox *)control_handler)->name;
00141                                 
00142                                 case C_OPTION:

00150 int cntrl_browse::getbgcolor(control *c)
00151                 {
00152                 switch(c->type)
00153                         {
00154                                 case C_BUTTON:
00155                                         return 9;
00156                                 break;
00157                                 case C_LABEL:
00158                                         return 1;
00159                                 break;
00160                                 case C_TEXTBOX:
00161                                         return 2;
00162                                 break;
00163                                 case C_CBOX:
00164                                         return 3;
00165                                 break;
00166                                 case C_OPTION:
00167                                         return 6;
00168                                 break;
00169 
00170                         }
00171                      return 0;
00172                 }

00289 int browse_controls(_form_def *obj )
00290 {      
00291 
00292 
00293     cntrl_browse *w;
00294 
00295         w=new cntrl_browse(obj);
00296     run:
00297       if(w->run() == CANCEL_CWIN)
00298         goto run;
00299        delete w;
00300           //deletes the window ..
00301                 return 1;
00302 }
